title: Investigate oneOf usage in API tests

labels.name: scope-testing
labels.description: Issues for adding test coverage, fixing existing tests or testing strategies.

labels.name: meta-investigate
labels.description: Issues found that require further investigation and may not have a specific resolution/fix

body:
JSON Schema `oneOf` usage in API tests is problematic and lead to some workaround:
- https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/blob/465834846a18619a30d7b0e11dfcac512248c0ec/packages/api/test/utils/checkAgainstSpec.ts#L58
- https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/blob/465834846a18619a30d7b0e11dfcac512248c0ec/packages/api/test/utils/checkAgainstSpec.ts#L82
- https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/blob/465834846a18619a30d7b0e11dfcac512248c0ec/packages/api/test/utils/parseOpenApiSpec.ts#L145

Investigate the underlying cause as it might lead to false negative or ignored failures.
